summary: online version of this article (10.1186/s12985-019-1165-1) contains supplementary material. additional files Additional file 1: (4.2MB, tiff) Figure S1. results for molecular dynamics production runs: first line: results for 20 ns of a negative control production run for VP1-PPLA model. residue, second line: results for 20 ns of a production run for VP1-PPLA model simulated under pressure. C – RMSF per residue; D – Solvent Accessible Surface Area per residue.
